personal_info.name: Ambuj Kumar Tripathi
personal_info.summary: Transitioning telecom engineer with 5+ years of FTTP & Fiber Network Experience, now focused on AI/cloud careers. Industry-certified with Google Cloud (GenAI, Vertex AI, IBM SkillsBuild) and Deloitte Data Analytics Job Simulation (Forage), where I analyzed business data, built Tableau dashboards, and classified insights in Excel. I have practical hands-on experience building & deploying live bots using IBM WatsonX and Hugging Face (self-coded, web-hosted demos). I've demonstrated expertise in Google Vertex AI by creating and managing virtual machines, configuring cloud instances, running Cloud Shell/SSH commands, and deploying ML environments. I am a fast learner, strong in AI prompt engineering, and capable of real project delivery. Open for entry-level AI, ML, cloud, or bot developer roles, ready to blend telecom domain strengths with new-gen AI/cloud skills in digital-first teams. With a background in telecom network systems and a growing expertise in generative AI and prompt engineering, I aim to bridge traditional infrastructure planning with modern AI-powered automation and design thinking. I am open to contributing in AI-driven projects, product experiments, or prompt optimization tasks where curiosity, clarity, and creative execution are valued. I also cleared BITSOM x Masai’s Product Management with Generative & Agentic AI program (2025).

projects.name: AI Resume Chatbot Integration using IBM WatsonX & Netlify
projects.description: Interactive resume chatbot with dynamic Q&A, greetings, skills-based responses, and fallback handling. Designed and deployed an AI-powered chatbot using IBM WatsonX Assistant. Built conversation flow with intents, entities, and dialogue nodes. Integrated the chatbot into a static webpage using HTML, and hosted it on Netlify for public access. Created custom intents, entities, and dialog flows in WatsonX Assistant. Used child nodes and conditional logic for dynamic user responses. Embedded WatsonX Assistant WebChat script into index.html. Demonstrated end-to-end chatbot lifecycle from design to hosting.

projects.name: Ambuj AI ChatBot – Resume Chatbot using Gradio (Deployed on Hugging Face Spaces)
projects.description: Prompt-engineered resume chatbot built using Python logic and ChatGPT-assisted development, deployed on Hugging Face Spaces. Developed a rule-based chatbot using Python and Gradio’s ChatInterface, hosted live on Hugging Face Spaces, to simulate real-time Q&A based on my professional resume. The bot responds to interview-style questions using pre-defined keyword logic for domains like work experience, certifications, tools, and projects. Project Scope: Personal branding, recruiter interaction, and AI-based resume assistant. Future Scope: Model integration via Hugging Face Transformers (e.g., DialoGPT, DistilGPT2), ability to upgrade with fine-tuned LLMs based on system specifications, can be scaled to handle semantic queries via NLP libraries (spaCy, transformers).
